Text: Good video, but really bad audio. I don't know if its just my speakers but I could barely hear their voices, and the music and other background noises were way too loud. I tried all the speakers I had and it made no difference. Thanks tho!

Yeah that is the AC3 audio. It was like that in the original 720p too. I've noticed the CW seems to have trouble with audio volume. The 350mb versions are almost always topped out making my speakers crackle, but the 720ps are usually fine. I'll keep an eye on it though, I might have to normalize the volume every once in awhile to prevent this from happening again.
